name: Unown C
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: It is believed that the variety of types of this Pokémon were created by evolutionary adaptation, as each possesses a different ability.

abilities.name: [Chase]
abilities.effect: As long as Unown C is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent’s Active Pokémon tries to retreat, flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. Apply Weakness and Resistance.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
